methods.name: config_dao
methods.description: Initializes DAO! Should be sent by owner (Creator) of DAO! Returns the manager address!

args.name: payment_transaction
args.description: Payment from manager to DAO for fees and initiation MBRs!

args.name: proposal_fee_stake
args.description: Fee for creating a new proposal paid in DAO Asset

args.name: proposal_fee_algo
args.description: Fee for creating a new proposal paid in Algo

args.name: min_subscription_algo
args.description: Minimum Algo balance for subscription, Default is 0!

args.name: min_subscription_stake
args.description: Minimum holdings of Dao Asset for subscription

boxes.name: manager_address
boxes.description: Dynamic box ref per manager account address

methods.name: subscribe_dao
methods.description: Subscribes an Algorand account into DAO! Returns total number of members!

args.name: payment_transaction
args.description: Payment from subscriber to DAO for fees and initiation MBRs!

boxes.name: member_reference
boxes.description: Dynamic box ref per member address public key

methods.name: unsubscribe_dao
methods.description: Unsubscribes an Algorand account from DAO! Returns total number of members! Member's participation will be withdrawn!

boxes.name: member_reference
boxes.description: Dynamic box ref per member address public key

methods.name: write_proposal_source_box

boxes.name: proposal_app
boxes.description: Dynamic box ref per member account address

boxes.name: proposal_clr
boxes.description: Dynamic box ref per proposal account address

methods.desc: Writes the compiled teal source of proposal to a corresponding box proposal_approval or proposal_clear

methods.name: write_staking_source_box

boxes.name: staking_app
boxes.description: Dynamic box ref

boxes.name: staking_clr
boxes.description: Dynamic box ref

methods.desc: Writes the compiled teal source of staking to a corresponding box staking_approval or staking_clear

methods.name: proposal_participate
methods.description: Participates a member to a Proposal! Returns the Proposal contract ID!

boxes.name: member_reference
boxes.description: Dynamic box ref per member account address

boxes.name: proposal_reference
boxes.description: Dynamic box ref per proposal app id

methods.name: proposal_withdraw_participate
methods.description: Withdraws a member participation from a  Proposal! Returns the Proposal contract ID! Withdraw is possible only before voting starts

boxes.name: member_reference
boxes.description: Dynamic box ref per member account address

boxes.name: proposal_reference
boxes.description: Dynamic box ref per proposal app id

methods.name: proposal_vote
methods.description: Optionally Votes to a Proposal! Returns the Proposal contract ID!

args.name: payment_transaction
args.description: Payment from participants to DAO for fees and participation MBRs!

args.name: asset_transfer_transaction
args.description: Asset transfer transaction to deposit DAO Token!

boxes.name: member_reference
boxes.description: Dynamic box ref per member account address

boxes.name: proposal_reference
boxes.description: Dynamic box ref per proposal account address

methods.name: activate_proposal
methods.description: Activates a Proposal! Proposals activate automatically by time or all_participated being satisfied! Otherwise this method from Proposer will override and if the participation fits one of available threshold programs then voting starts! Returns the Proposal contract ID!

args.name: payment_transaction
args.description: Payment from manager to DAO for fees!

boxes.name: member_reference
boxes.description: Dynamic box ref per member account address

boxes.name: proposal_reference
boxes.description: Dynamic box ref per proposal account address

methods.name: close_proposal
methods.description: Force closes a Proposal contract as last resort after Proposal Creator, manager_address and DAO manager_address send this ABI call and last one clears and closes Proposal and re-funds everyone! Returns the Proposal contract ID!

args.name: payment_transaction
args.description: Payment from manager to DAO for fees!

boxes.description: Dynamic box ref per member account address
